message.body: How was New York? Do you wanna try to see Annabelle this week?
Hey!! NY was great! I do wanna see Annabelle, but Jules and I are heading out of town right now for that conference at that weird meditation center...gon
na be so weird.
I'm back Friday though if you wanna see it this weekend!
Oh yeah!!! Have fun on your silent vacation! Hunters opening is Saturday so we will be in NJ but maybe a Sunday matinee?
Oh awesome! So exciting! When are you guys heading to NJ? I have clients Sunday afternoon, but could do Friday night or Sunday night or a night next week! :)
We will probably head out there in the afternoon and get dinner there. Friday night I have to go to the Rotunda to see a colleagues show at 9 but Sunday night could work or a night next week!
Please take lots of pics of the meditation place! Are you smuggling booze?
Definitely smuggling booze! I'm wearing my fashion poncho which is pretty much a blanket with a zipper and my crystal necklace...I am so ready for meditation.
Lol. You are really gonna fit in
They're gonna ask me to live there with them. I might not make it back.
You'll be runnin' the joint!
They aren't gonna be ready for this.
First order of business, reinstate alcohol
And no quiet time.
Oh yeah that has to go
Where in NJ is hunters show?
Is he selling any of his art?
It's at this place called parlor gallery in asbury park. Hopefully he will sell a few big ones there but the gallery takes 50%
So it's kind of insane
Oh man that's crazy!
Jules and I might try and come Saturday!
Cool!!!! It's kind if a hike but it would be awesome if you came! Is have someone to talk to!
I really love and want that print of his that you put on your instagram.
How far is it to get there? I'd love to go!
I'm looking at it right now it's so cool. Oh it's really far I just looked it up. Hour 45 minutes
That's not too far really...is that print really expensive?
I have no idea how much the new stuff is. I think the gallery prices are high to make up for the loss
But they are prints so they aren't as much as the hand cut stuff
Cool. If he has more of that one or if I can afford it I want it!
I'll ask him how much! It's my favorite new one aside from the giant red thing
No skulls
Thank god
I love the giant red one too!
Haha I love skulls...so southwestern.
Lol. People love skulls! I think it's because of rock and roll.
Lol
Definitely rock and roll and southwest.
I'm seeing gone girl
Right now?
I really wanna see that.
I read the book though so I know what happens.
Right this minute!
Haha let me know what you think!
